dalserver.ssa

Class SsapQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • dalserver.DbmsQuery
      • dalserver.ssa.SsapQuery

  • public class SsapQuery
extends DbmsQuery
    SsapQuery provides a simple spectrum access discovery capability for any spectrum collection which can be described via spectrum metadata stored in a DBMS-hosted Spectrum table. Both SSA V1 and V2(proto) are supported.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SsapQuery(java.lang.String dbType, java.lang.String jdbcDriver)
      Constructor to generate a new DBMS query object, providing the functionality to query a remote DBMS-hosted catalog.

    • Method Detail

      • addFields

        public void addFields(SsapParamSet params,
             RequestResponse response)
               throws DalServerException
        Add fields to the request response table for the discovery query.
        Parameters:
        params - The SSAP service input parameters.
        response - The request response object. The metadata returned by a service is dynamically configurable. By default certain common fields of the Spectrum data model are returned (what is considered "common" here is defined by this implementation). The specific service configuration may restrict or extend this standard set of metadata, adding additional standard DM fields or custom data provider-defined fields, or omitting common fields that are not used. The function of addFields is to dynamically determine, based upon the service configuration, what standard or custom fields to return in a query response, and define these output fields. When the query response is later built from the Spectrum table query, it will try to provide values for all the fields defined here.
        Throws:
        DalServerException

      • queryDataset

        public java.lang.String queryDataset(java.lang.String tableName,
                            java.lang.String id,
                            java.lang.String attribute)
                              throws DalServerException
        Query the spectrum table for a record with the given ID, and return the indicated attribute as the output value.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The DBMS table to be queried
        id - The ID of the record to be accessed
        attribute - The table field to be returned
        Throws:
        DalServerException

      • query

        public void query(SsapService ssap,
         SsapParamSet params,
         RequestResponse response)
           throws DalServerException,
                  DalOverflowException
        Query the spectrum metadata table, writing results as a SSAP query response to the output request response object. The response object can later be serialized and returned in various output formats.
        Parameters:
        ssap - The SSAP service instance.
        params - The SSAP service input parameters.
        response - The request response object.
        Throws:
        DalServerException
        DalOverflowException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Test the SSAP DBMS interface. 
           ingest [csv-file]    Turn a CSV version of the SSAP data model
                                into a SsapData class which contains raw data
                                defining the data model.

   doc [type]           Generate an HTML version of the SSAP keyword
                                dictionary.

   table [type]         Generate Java code to create the indicated
                                keywords in a RequestResponse object.
